name: Momotaro Dentetsu World: Chikyuu wa Kibou de Mawatteru!
name_original: Momotaro Dentetsu World: Chikyuu wa Kibou de Mawatteru!
description: The "Momotaro Dentetsu" series, where you become the president and aim to become the number one in total assets while acquiring properties in various places. This work "Momotaro Electric Railway World-The Earth is spinning with hope! ~ ", you can travel around the world while playing sugoroku on the earth represented by the first spherical map in the series. In addition to new cards, new elements such as properties, events, and historical heroes are appearing all over the world. In addition, Binbogami, who is familiar with the series, also transforms into a "world" specification and unfolds an unseen evil deed. Of course, this work also supports online battles with friends and up to 4 people. Let's all enjoy the feeling of traveling abroad on "Momotetsu"!
